mapper.select: SELECT r.record_book_num recordBookNum , r.record_book_time recordBookTime , r.member_id memberId , r.book_isbn13 bookIsbn13 , b.bookname bookname FROM record r INNER JOIN book b ON r.book_isbn13 = b.book_isbn13 WHERE r.member_id=#{memberId} ORDER BY r.record_book_time DESC

SELECT r.record_book_num recordBookNum , r.record_book_content recordBookContent , r.record_book_score recordBookScore , r.record_book_time recordBookTime , r.record_book_tag1 recordBookTag1 , r.member_id memberId , r.book_isbn13 bookIsbn13 , b.bookname bookname FROM record r INNER JOIN book b ON r.book_isbn13 = b.book_isbn13 WHERE record_book_num=#{recordBookNum}
